Uses of Class
com.interface21.validation.BindException

Packages that use BindException
com.interface21.validation Provides data binding and validation functionality, for usage in business and/or UI layers. 
com.interface21.web.bind Provides web-specific data binding functionality, including a utility class for easy invocation of binding and validation. 
com.interface21.web.servlet.mvc Standard handler implementations for Spring's web MVC framework.

 class DataBinder
          Binder that allows for binding property values to a target object.
 

Methods in com.interface21.validation that throw BindException
 java.util.Map DataBinder.close()
          Close this DataBinder, which may result in throwing a BindException if it encountered any errors
